Text: Sorry did not include the specs on the files. Used Sony Sound Forge and the Low VBR setting. Windows registers it as a 160 kbs file, but they are VBR. Not a dead ringer for the cd's, I apologize, but it is an audio book, not a listening cd... i hope you enjoy and please leave some feedback!
If this is the Duncan Wells narration, I bought it last christmas, stopped smoking before new years eve, halfway through the book I couldn't light a cigarrette anymore...

Thanks ever so much for this, I've been smoking since I was 19 (am 32 now) and it's high time I quit. I work with kids and don't want to be a bad example to them - plus I want to keep on being able to race round the playground and not have the multiple colds I get from the little buggers every year turn into bronchitis by the end of the winter! Nicotine replacement does nothing for me, and I've heard lots of good things about this book. Thanks again!

The easiest way to stop smoking for everyone:
Den letteste måten å slutte å røyke for alle på:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5077573/Allen_Carrs_Endelig_ikke-r_yker__-_norsk_Lydbok

In Norwegian and English - 2 audio books:

Allen Carr's Easyway to stop smoking.
Allen Carrs Endelig ikke-røyker!

MP3-pro CD-quality 6½ hours.
